website_summaries.verdict: Whether you're looking to freshen up your home or simply want to treat your fur baby to a soothing experience, this vet-approved candle is solid choice.
pros: Effectively cancels permeating pet odors without being overwhelming
Each candle is infused with a blend of soothing scents, carefully selected to calm anxious or energetic pets
Made with soy wax, cotton wicks, and natural extracts
Comes in a wide variety of fragrances
cons: Rather expensive, given the size of the candle

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this product.
customer_reviews.text: It's an OK candle. Does something on the dog smell but not much. The label on the glass container is very hard to get off thus I wouldn't buy it again. looks bad.
customer_reviews.author: C. G. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect fragrance you order.
customer_reviews.text: If you want something other than lemongrass don't order from this seller. Twice I've ordered another fragrance and twice I've received Lemongrass.
customer_reviews.author: LaRee

customer_reviews.title: Well made and works really well
customer_reviews.text: I see a lot of bad reviews about the size, I’m completely fine with the size for the price. It’s soy and has a cotton wic. I’m willing to spend extra cash on products that wont harm my pet. I got the calming vanilla and it’s a subtle lovely smell in my house that I love, it also did help calm my terrier mix. A product I would recommend and plan to buy one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: yanv

customer_reviews.title: Want to love it but..
customer_reviews.text: First off I have two dogs so I wanted to find a candle that is good to have around pets and smells good to help eliminate odor. I bought the vanilla scent and it has great potency. I get whiffs of the smell walking past it. I am very pleased with that! However, I had it burning for ultimately 5-10mins and it went out. Perhaps the wick wasn't the best but now I can't use it without the flame going out in only a few minutes. For the price this shouldn't be happening. I really want to love this candle but I can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am totally sold.
customer_reviews.text: My home smells delicious. I will no longer purchase different candles, wax melts or plug ins from different brands. I found the aromatherapy we needed. Give them a try, you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Because of you

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Nice light scent, works exactly like it states! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Gailliot

customer_reviews.title: Smells lovely
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of skeptical about buying this candle bc the size is small and the price wasn’t. I really wanted a candle that is safe for my animals though so I gave it a shot and I’m glad I did. It smells wonderful and it lasted much longer than I thought it would. I will definitely be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Burned away too fast
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about a week - not worth the price. Burned it about 2 hours a day and it was gone way too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Candle does not work with calming but kept the room smelling great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this candle for my sister because she has a puppy who neds to be a little calmer. Unfortunately, I was informed the candle was no help but it did keep her room smelling great.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I personally didn't care for the vanilla scent. It almost had a sour smell, almost like vanilla yogurt.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Prante

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, but not a good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice vanilla scent. It’s not overpowering and it does seem to neutralize stinky pet smells. The only thing I don’t like is that it burns VERY quickly, so it doesn’t last long at all. We received this just last week and there’s about an inch of wax left. (They recommend not burning past a 1/2 inch.) I’m not overly price sensitive, but $14 for a 6oz candle in no frills packaging that’s nearly gone after a week of use is a terrible value. I like it, but it won’t be a long term solution.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F.

customer_reviews.title: Just not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very little scent and doesn't burn that well. There are to many other products that work and cost less!
customer_reviews.author: Joe
